name: Dandara
description: In a bizarre universe where the oppressed are on the brink of oblivion, Dandara has awoken to reshape the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 220, Radeon HD 8400 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Playing with a controller is strongly recommended.
recommended_requirements: Additional Notes: Playing with a controller is strongly recommended.
